page.text: The omnico reformation tube is an impressive piece of technology. It does you almost no good stuck as it is in the depths of a dangerous Omnico facility though so you might want to remove it to take it with you. This'll also give you a chance to analyze the design for later reproduction.
You take the time to analyse the device so you can reproduce the reactor later then, levered it out of its mountings and can now take it with you
